Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Hotel Terminus in Grenoble, you'll be minutes from WTC Grenoble and close to Dauphinois Museum. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Minatec and Grenoble-Bastille Cable Car.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include complimentary newspapers and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Grenoble? This hotel has facilities measuring 323 square feet (30 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alps Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Terminus is Grenoble (GNB-Grenoble - Isere) - 35.3 km / 21.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
